page.title: 12TEMPLETON WOMEN'S INSTITUTE.
page.content: Marjorie Philips founded the Women's Institute in Templeton.The W.I. holds meetings on the first Tuesday of every month except August. There are 39 members altogether but mostly only 25_30 members attend meetings regularly. The meetings start at 7.30pm.The membership fee this year is Â£4.The W.I.gives concerts. They have performed at the Torch Theatre in Milford Haven and also in the Church Hall in Templeton. They hold their meetings in the Church Hall. Peggy Morgan plays the piano when the W.I. holds concerts and plays.They make their own costumes. The Templeton W.I. celebrates its 40th Anniversary in October 1986.
